title: [$250] Expense - "Submit" changes to "Approve" on preview when online after partially approve offline

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.72-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/74541 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** ibellicotest+2154@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Motorola MotoG60 / Android 12 / Chrome (mWeb / Hybrid app) - Windows 11 / Chrome **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Prerequisite: Account has at least one workspace. 1. Open the Expensify app. 2. Open any workspace chat. 3. Create two manual expenses. 4. Open the report. 5. Long tap and select one of the expenses. 6. Tap on dropdown menu and select "Hold" 7. Enter any reason and hold the expense. 8. Return to chat. 9. Tap on "Submit" on report preview. 10. Turn off internet connection. 11. Tap on "Approve" 12. Approve only the unheld amount. 13. Note that held expense is moved to a new report and shows a "Submit" button on preview. 14. Turn on internet connection. 15. Note that "Submit" button changes to "Approve". ## Expected Result: After partially approving report offline, preview of held expense should automatically display an "Approve" button. ## Actual Result: After partially approving a report while offline, preview of held expense shows a "Submit" button, that changes to "Approve" when back online. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6aabf555-5847-484b-a4c3-323a565b75e7 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
Upwork Automation - Do Not Edit
  • Upwork Job URL: https://www.upwork.com/jobs/~021996731646343908370
  • Upwork Job ID: 1996731646343908370
  • Last Price Increase: 2025-12-05
Issue OwnerCurrent Issue Owner: @situchan

Launch app 2. Open the IOU 3. Tap pay dropdown and select workspace with bank account added 4. Navigate to 1:1 chat 5. Open the thread page for system message "moved this expense" 6. Tap header - members 7. Note header subtitle 8. Navigate back twice and tap search icon 9. Note the thread chat in search ## Expected Result: In members section, header subtitle must not show html tags. In search, thread chat must not be shown as html tags. ## Actual Result: In members section, header subtitle shows html tags. In search, thread chat is shown as html tags. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/2825caa8-0dd6-480e-8ed0-b42e4da40924 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

title: Refactor ConfirmModal usage to useConfirmModal in various components, hooks, and providers

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
Coming from https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/68799#issuecomment-3562885730...

### Problem
When every component mounts its own ConfirmModal in the component tree, it creates component bloat, memory overhead from multiple modal instances, and repetitive boilerplate code that makes the application harder to maintain.

### Solution
Refactor ConfirmModal usage to useConfirmModal in the following files:

```
ImportSpreadsheet.tsx
ImportSpreadsheetConfirmModal.tsx
DotIndicatorMessage.tsx
BookTravelButton.tsx
AccountSwitcher.tsx
ExportWithDropdownMenu.tsx
LocationPermissionModal/index.tsx
LocationPermissionModal/index.desktop.tsx
ContactPermissionModal/index.native.tsx
FocusModeNotification.tsx
SupportalPermissionDeniedModalProvider.tsx
DelegateNoAccessModalProvider.tsx
LockedAccountModalProvider.tsx
useFilesValidation.tsx
useCreateEmptyReportConfirmation.tsx
src/Expensify.tsx
TransactionReceiptModalContent.tsx
```

<details><summary>Issue Owner</summary>Current Issue Owner: @</details>
